DESCRIPTION: This is a Poker Card. Play to draw 1 card, keep them until the end of your turn for Showdown effects.
At the end of your turn, you receive Showdown effects from Poker Cards in you hand. They are boosted by poker hand you score.
Showdown Effect: Deal N damage to a random enemy
Showdown Effect: Deal N damage to all enemies
The number of symbols on Poker Cards. During Showdown, the number of suits coming out is equal to their Rank.
